<appender name="sendemail_file" class="com.adventnet.management.log.NMSRollingFileAppender"> <param name="File" value="logs/sendEmaillogs.txt"/> <param name="MaxFileSize" value="1MB"/> <param name="MaxBackupIndex" value="10"/> <layout class="org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout"> <param name="ConversionPattern" value="[%d{dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss:SSS}] %-10c{2}: %m%n"/> </layout> </appender>
